sunami, bhukampana wani swabhawika wyasanayan sandaha sarthakawa muhunadimata awashya thakshanika ha wisheshagnya danuma oonama awasthawakadi shri lankawa wetha labadimata sudanam bawa japan rajaya awadharanaya karayi.ee sandaha wana thakshanika ha wisheshagnya danuma japanaya sathuwa ihala mattamaka pawathina bawada meya shri lankawata athishaya wadagath wana bawada shri lankawe japana thanapathi nobuhitho hobo mahatha pawasayi.thanapathiwaraya me bawa sandahan kale madhya wetha andahas dakwamini.pasifik gini walalla awata menma indiyan sagaraya awata ratawal rasak swabhawika wyasanayanta nirantharayen goduru wana bawa penwadun shri lankawe japana thanapathiwaraya ewani thaththwayan kalthiya handuna ganima wadagath bawada ee sandaha shri lankawata uparima sahaya labadena bawada sandahan kaleya.pasugiya 11 da athiwu bhukampana thaththwayen shri lankawe pradesha rasaka godanangili walata balapamak ella kala bawada pasugiya 2004 wasare shri lankawata pamini sunami wyasanayen mulumaninma winashayata path hikkaduwa polis sthanaya prathinirmanaya kirima sandaha japanaye wisheshagnya sahaya labunu bawada nobuhitho hobo mahatha sihipath kaleya.mewani bhu kamipana thaththwayanta muhunadima sandaha shri lankawa sudanam wiyayuthu bawa penwadun ee mahatha japana rajayen labadena sahayogaya matha ewani thaththwayan kalthiya nirikshanaya kirima, pasukampana thaththwayan gana menma ee sandaha oroththu dena paridi godanangili nirmanaya kirima aadiya sandaha wisheshagnya danuma labagatha haki bawada prakasha kaleya.mewani aapadawan sandaha shri lankawata sahayogaya labadimen awadanam thaththwayen midi sarthaka prathipala athkara gatha haki bawada shri lankawe japana thanapathiwaraya sandahan kaleya..

ee pilibanda adahas dakwamin niyojya amathya ajith pi perera mahatha prakasha kale wimal wirawansha mahatha amathyawarayekuwa sitiyadi rajaye wahana 40k awabhawithawa nisa rajayata rupiyal laksha 916 ka alabhayak siduwa athi bawayi.thama gnyathi hithamithuranta rajaye wahana ayatha lesa bhawitha kirimata labadi athi athara hithawathun athara madhyawedin ha swamin wahanselada sitina bawa sandahan.nithiya hamadenatama poduwe kriyathmaka wiya yuthu bawa sandahan kala niyojya amathyawaraya sandahan kale ewakata rajya injineru sansthawe sabhapathiwarayawa siti wathman ejapa parlimenthu manthri aashu marasinha aya tha lesa rajaye wahana bhawitha kara nomathi bawath ohu ema kriyawaliyata dayaka wi nomathi bawathya.wimal wirawansha mahathage kriyakalapaya pilibanda thibu kanassalla hethuwen masa 10 k wani kalayak thula aashu marasinha mahatha siya dhurayen illa as wu bawa amathya rajitha senarathna mahatha kiya sitiyeya.
